basics.name: Willie Man
basics.label: Data Specialist
basics.summary: Design and implement data solutions for analysis, automation, and cloud-based machine learning adoption.

work.name: Data Quality Manager
work.summary: Lead data quality improvement projects, owning the strategy, roadmap, and delivery of key initiatives. Managed a team and external vendors, delivering results across multiple projects.
highlights: Architected and implemented a Java-based data quality reporting application, driving a significant improvement in data health by executing the Data Quality Management Program.

Led an ETL workstream, generating revenue and saving $2M annually by automating data processes for hundreds of thousands of records and millions of monthly updates. Responsibilities included requirements gathering, testing, and stakeholder approvals.
Leading the scoping and planning of a ServiceNow ETL implementation, replacing the existing data management tool with a more scalable solution that enhances data processing efficiency.

work.name: IT Financial Business Analyst
work.summary: Administered an enterprise financial system, generating millions in monthly invoices for Texas Public Agencies, ensuring accuracy and timely processing.
highlights: Led several data analytics and automation project initiatives that included developing automated billing methodology, creating a financial forecast ($12 Billion forecasted over 4 years), and automating manual tasks.

volunteer.organization: Harvest Missions Community Church (HMCC) of Austin

awards.title: Data Detective
awards.summary: A Data Detective is a highly analytical professional with a knack for uncovering the root causes of issues and identifying patterns hidden within complex and disparate datasets. This individual combines technical expertise with critical thinking to piece together information from diverse sources, constructing a clear narrative or solution where ambiguity once reigned. Their skill set often includes advanced data analysis, a deep understanding of business processes, and the ability to ask the right questions to get to the bottom of problems.

certificates.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Engineer Associate
Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate

publications.name: The Innocence Initiative 2020
publications.summary: The Innocence Initiative is a collaborative effort to elevate the data, listen to the real-life stories of Black girls, and address disparities that perpetuate adultification bias through advocacy, training, and public awareness.

projects.name: Apple cultivars and climate change in the US
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
